product_name: CliniqueEven Better Makeup Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Foundation
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Even Better Makeup Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Foundation. Dermatologist-developed liquid foundation visibly reduces dark spots in 12 weeks.*
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry Combination, Combination OilyDermatologist-developed formula with vitamin C. Visibly reduces dark spots after 12 weeks of daily use.Broad Spectrum SPF 15 helps protect against future discoloration.Creamy formula hydrates and smooths, and gives skin a natural finish with moderate coverage.Stay-true pigments won't change color on your skin.Built with BetterFlex Technology, a special blend of polymers that helps give this foundation flexibility, so it moves when you move and smiles when you smile.Dermatologist tested.Ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Key IngredientsVitamin CBroad Spectrum SPF 53Research ResultsDermatologist-developed liquid foundation visibly reduces dark spots in 12 weeks.**Clinical testing conducted on 22 women after using product for 12 weeks.91% say color stays true all day.**90% say skin feels comfortable all day.**90% say it feels weightless on skin.****Consumer testing on 546 women after using product for 2 weeks.Item 2206255How To UseStart in center of face, blending foundation outward.Build coverage as needed.Remove with your favorite Clinique makeup remover.IngredientsActive: Octinoxate 5.90%, Titanium Dioxide 3.50%, Zinc Oxide 2.80%. Inactive: Water\Aqua\Eau, Methyl Trimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Alumina, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Extract, Betula Alba (Birch) Bark Extract, Saccharomyces Lysate Extract, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Glycerin, Sodium Myristoyl Sarcosinate, Acetyl Glucosamine, Caprylyl Methicone, Methicone, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dimethicone Crosspolymer-3, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Lecithin, Laureth-7, Tocopheryl Acetate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Mica, Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start in center of face, blending foundation outward.Build coverage as needed.Remove with your favorite Clinique makeup remover.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love this! I have dry skin and it's very hydrating and lasts all day. You can build the coverage or just use very little depending on your preference. I will for sure be buying this again. The only issue is there is not enough in the bottle.

reviews.headline: Great coverage
reviews.comments: I have been wearing this makeup for over thirty years. It makes my skin look flawless. There are many shades to choose from and I am sure you too will find one that is perfect for your tone.

reviews.headline: Would not recommend
reviews.comments: So many positive reviews led me to buy this junk. Looks horrible. Only buy if you don't need foundation and your skin is already perfect. Covers nothing.

reviews.headline: Wanted to like but not for me
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this foundation from Clinique but unfortunately it was not what I had hoped for. I asked for a shade match in stores because I have fair, olive skin and finding foundation that actually matches my skin tone is very difficult. I thought they got pretty close, but in natural light, it was way too pink. I found it too heavy on my skin and an almost pasty texture. I have very dry skin and even with good skin prep, it highlighted every dry area and would look patchy. Unfortunately this will be a return.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Great coverage and a perfect match to my skin color. I'd buy it again

reviews.headline: Better than Estee Lauder!
reviews.comments: I recently switched from Estee Lauder to Clinique.  I am 51, and my skin tone is very uneven and this foundation has beautiful highlights built right in.  It goes on beautifully.  It does not float on top of my skin.  It wears perfectly all day!

reviews.headline: I will buy this product over and over
reviews.comments: Such a good foundation and blends easily and looks like my natural skin I love it

reviews.headline: New formula is AWFUL!
reviews.comments: Why in the world did you change the formula!? This is awful! I have to use more, it's oily, leaves streaks. You messed with the best and turned it into the worst!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Clinique surprise me, I'm completely in love with this foundation, the color match perfe t with my skin and left a radiance finish. I recommend 100%

reviews.headline: Getting compliments on my skin
reviews.comments:
I am obsessed with this foundation! Since I started wearing it, I've gotten so many compliments on my skin this foundation gives a fresh look without feeling heavy. ðŸ’• I do pair it with a really good hydrating primer. The coverage is surprisingly good, I still use concealer for spots that need it. 

The finish is beautiful!!! So smooth and natural looking. The only thing I wish is that it came with a pump instead of a squeeze bottle, but honestly, I love it so much that I don't even mind.

A friend recommended it to me, and I'm so glad she did! Will definitely repurchase. ðŸ’—

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I have tried a lot of foundations, and this one is the best!  I am oily in the tzone and this one has been great for that. The color was a perfect match and stays on all day, and thats a big one in the south. I have had multiple comments about how great my skin looks. I will be buying this again!

reviews.headline: A decent skin tint
reviews.comments: I've used this for over a year and have gotten good wear out of my bottle (shade: "custard"). It's a good skin tint, light coverage you can build up that can go a long way. As a pale person, the light shades pull/oxidizes yellow no matter if you buy a shade said to be cool toned. I've also seen othet people say they're darker shades are too great but I can't comment on that. Too much can look cakey, beyond what normal makeup on normal skin looks like. It does what a skin tint should, but not for the price point in my opinion.

reviews.headline: Yes, I will continue to buy!
reviews.comments: Goes great with my skin tone.

reviews.headline: Great product n brand
reviews.comments: Great coverage n color for me ,not oily, wish it was cheaper but cheaper makeup is usually oily. I have bought this product for awhile now. Highly recommend Clinique products

reviews.headline: No good for my too natural
reviews.comments: No good for my skin.too natural.

reviews.headline: Wonderful
reviews.comments: Great for maturing skin. The associate's are very helpful as well.

reviews.headline: Light coverage to even out skin tone
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this foundation,! The associate that suggested this product listen to me when I told her I would like a like foundation to blend and have light coverage and it is just that I LOVE it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Good coverage. Seems to wear well.

reviews.headline: Great Medium Coverage Foundation!
reviews.comments:
Clinique was the first makeup I ever used and 20 years later I'm back!
Hope at the Ulta on Polaris in Columbus, Ohio did a great job in color matching me and guiding me through a few different options.  
The Even Better Broad Spectrum is a great medium coverage foundation.  I'm 41 with dry skin and old acne scars.  This does a great job hiding those old scars and covering my redness.  
I love the clean tip on the squeezable bottle, so I don't have a messy cap.  
It's easy to build up coverage with a brush, and it blends beautifully with a sponge.

reviews.headline: Nice but not for me
reviews.comments:
I forgot my normal Clinique super balanced foundation while on vacation. Quick ran into Ulta and they didn't carry that specific foundation at this store so tried the Even Better foundation. Ugh, I immediately broke out from it after using it one time. Now to be fair I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin so it's probably just me. 

It was light weight and easy to apply but will be returning just because of my sensitive skin.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Last year I took a makeup class and began doing lots of tutorials and research. I wanted a more advanced mature look and I wanted better quality makeup to properly care for my skin.
Foundation was the first place I started.
I went to almost every makeup kiosk in the dept stores and got lots of foundation samples to try. Amongst them were EstÃ©e Lauder, Chanel, Origins, Laura Mercier, and of course Clinique.
I tried every single one at least a few times, but in the end I kept coming back to this one. It's lightweight, evens my skin tone greatly, is so smooth, and didn't bother my skin at all. I'm sorry but there was no contest. The others just did not stand up against this one. Mind you I was completely unbiased. I just wanted fresh looking even skin with a lightweight feel, and this was the only foundation to deliver that for me.
I was completely ready to pay the very high prices of the other brands too, but no need, at around $25, I've had this fantastic foundation for nearly a year and am only now beginning to run out.
Props to Clinique for this one!
faceoff_positive.headline: Glad I tried this!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I ended up having to purchase the even better foundation after trying to order the pore refining solution foundation I had been using for quite some time and absolutely loved. I found out it was discontinued. I was told the even better foundation should be about the same but it was not . I haven't had a break out using the pore refining solution foundation but as soon as I started using the even better foundation I had terrible breakouts and my face always looked greasy and oily. I started using Clinique to help with breakouts and it definitely helped until using the even better foundation. I hope Clinique will go back to the pore refining solution foundation or come out with a product like it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not even better

rollup.name: Even Better Makeup Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Foundation
